channel.title: 1.7.3.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in 1.7.3.x on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.4 and 1.6.1.20
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.4 and 1.6.1.20 are now available. These versions fix security and PHP compatiblity issues.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.3 and 1.6.1.19
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.3 and 1.6.1.19 are now available. Those maintenance releases fixes specific issues for the GDPR compliance.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.2
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.2 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 17 issues reported on version 1.7.3.x.

item.title: Release of PrestaShop 1.7.3.1
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.1 is now available. This maintenance release fixes 17 issues reported on version 1.7.3.x.

item.title: Exposing data with confidence in PrestaShop 1.7
item.description: During the last few months, we have received a lot of feedback from the community pointing out issues with how PrestaShop 1.7 makes shop data available in the front office.

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 is available!
item.description: Dear community, it is a great day for us all. Many “when will it be released?” later, we are thrilled to announce the birth of PrestaShop 1.7.3!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 RC1 is open for feedback!
item.description: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 Release Candidate is now ready for you to test!

item.title: PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 beta 1 is out!
item.description: The first beta version for PrestaShop 1.7.3.0 is now ready for you to test and give feedback about!

item.title: Make modules on the back office great again!
item.description: Since the release of 1.7.0, we are working hard on improving the way developers can customize and enhancing the quality of PrestaShop.
